name: @zeta-chain/cli
description: An MCP server that connects ZetaChain CLI into your editor. Query balances, send cross-chain transactions, and manage universal contracts directly through MCP.

tools.name: accounts_show
tools.title: Accounts Show
tools.description: View details of a specific account

tools.name: query_balances
tools.title: Query Balances
tools.description: Fetch native and ZRC-20 token balances

tools.name: query_cctx
tools.title: Query Cctx
tools.description: Track the status of a cross-chain transaction.

tools.name: query_contracts_list
tools.title: Query Contracts List
tools.description: List protocol contracts on all connected chains

tools.name: query_contracts_show
tools.title: Query Contracts Show
tools.description: Show a protocol contract address on a specific chain

tools.name: query_tokens_show
tools.title: Query Tokens Show
tools.description: Show details for a ZRC-20 token

tools.name: query_chains_show
tools.title: Query Chains Show
tools.description: Show details for a connected chain

tools.name: faucet
tools.title: Faucet
tools.description: Request testnet ZETA tokens from the faucet

tools.name: zetachain_call
tools.title: Zetachain Call
tools.description: Call a contract on a connected chain from ZetaChain

tools.name: zetachain_withdraw
tools.title: Zetachain Withdraw
tools.description: Withdraw tokens from ZetaChain to a connected chain

tools.name: zetachain_withdraw-and-call
tools.title: Zetachain Withdraw-and-call
tools.description: Withdraw tokens and call a contract on a connected chain

tools.name: evm_call
tools.title: Evm Call
tools.description: Call a contract on ZetaChain from an EVM-compatible chain

tools.name: evm_deposit-and-call
tools.title: Evm Deposit-and-call
tools.description: Deposit tokens and call a contract on ZetaChain from an EVM-compatible chain

tools.name: evm_deposit
tools.title: Evm Deposit
tools.description: Deposit tokens to ZetaChain from an EVM-compatible chain

tools.name: solana_call
tools.title: Solana Call
tools.description: Call a contract on ZetaChain from Solana

tools.name: solana_deposit-and-call
tools.title: Solana Deposit-and-call
tools.description: Deposit tokens from Solana and call a contract on ZetaChain

tools.name: sui_deposit-and-call
tools.title: Sui Deposit-and-call
tools.description: Deposit tokens from Sui and call a contract on ZetaChain

tools.name: ton_deposit-and-call
tools.title: Ton Deposit-and-call
tools.description: Deposit TON and call a contract on ZetaChain

tools.name: bitcoin_inscription_deposit-and-call
tools.title: Bitcoin Inscription Deposit-and-call
tools.description: Deposit BTC and call a contract on ZetaChain

tools.name: bitcoin_inscription_encode
tools.title: Bitcoin Inscription Encode
tools.description: Encode data for Bitcoin transactions using ABI encoding

tools.name: bitcoin_memo_deposit-and-call
tools.title: Bitcoin Memo Deposit-and-call
tools.description: Deposit BTC and call a contract on ZetaChain
